name: Excitari: The Evil has Awakened
description:
Welcome! We are happy that you are here.

Excitari - The Evil has Awakened is an up to 5 person co-op game.  Which is still in fully development.  The goal in Excitari is to expose and destroy ghosts, creatures and other supernatural phenomena. In the currently playable tech demo, your task is to find out what kind of ghost it is based on characteristics and behavior and then destroy it.

Our future goals
We still have a lot of work ahead of us to implement our goals and ideas in the future. Here is a small list of features we would like to implement over time.

Character creation
You will be able to create your own character.

Crafting
For your hunt you will need a variety of tools. Some of them you'll have to create and others you'll be able to upgrade. 

Headquarter
In your headquarters you'll be able to hang out with your friends and accept new hunting missions. Besides, you'll expand your headquarters to create better tools.

Mini open world
Explore your city: Warden Creek and destroy all evil.

Ghosts
There will be a number of ghosts, with different characteristics and behavior. 

Creatures
There will be other creatures, like werewolves and vampires. Who are waiting to be hunted by you.
